jd: From: Srinath, IT Strategies srinath@itstrategiesinc.com Reply to: srinath@itstrategiesinc.com Job Title: AWS Python Developer Location: Chicago, IL / Plano, TX (Day1 Onsite) Duration: 6 months Contract Primary Skills: • Programming Languages: o Proficiency in Python o Experience with tool development and integration using these languages • GitHub Integration: o Experience with integrating tools and applications with GitHub o Understanding of GitHub APIs and workflows Secondary Skills: • Web Development: o Familiarity with web frameworks and development practices in Python o Knowledge of API development and RESTful services • Testing and Debugging: o Strong debugging and troubleshooting skills o Experience with unit testing and test automation Roles and Responsibilities: • Develop and maintain tools and applications using Python • Integrate tools and applications with GitHub for seamless workflows • Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code • Debug and troubleshoot issues in the developed applications • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software
